FuncDef: This command configures the CCM transmission interval for all MEPs in the association.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the interval between CCM transmissions to be used by all MEPs in the MA. Values-10 milliseconds, 100 milliseconds, 1 second, 10 seconds, 60 seconds, 600 seconds, 100 milliseconds. ParamDefault: Default- 10 (seconds)
